statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT quiz_score, exam_result FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_result > 80;
SELECT assignment_submission FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score < 50;
SELECT student_id, exam_result FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_result BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_id, assignment_submission FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_result > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_submission FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score >= 90 ORDER BY quiz_score ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, AVG(quiz_score) AS avg_quiz_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_result < 70;
SELECT MAX(quiz_score) AS highest_quiz_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE exam_result >= 60;
SELECT student_id, exam_result FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score < 50 OR exam_result < 50 ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT result, exam_id, student_id FROM exam_results WHERE result > 80;
SELECT * FROM exam_results WHERE exam_id = 5 AND student_id = 3;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score < 70;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT exam_id, result, student_id FROM exam_results WHERE result >= 70 ORDER BY exam_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_id = 1 AND score < 60;
SELECT exam_id, student_id, result FROM exam_results WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY result ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY score DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score >= 90;
SELECT exam_id, result FROM exam_results ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignment_submissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM assignment_submissions GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, result FROM exam_results WHERE result = 'Pass' ORDER BY student_id, exam_id;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM assignment_submissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade, COUNT(student_id) as num_students FROM assignment_submissions GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_students > 2 ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM students WHERE enrollment_year >= 2018 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM students WHERE enrollment_year = 2021 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, submission_text FROM assignment_submissions WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, grade FROM exam_results WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC, student_id DESC;

SELECT student_name, exam_id, grade FROM students JOIN exam_results ON students.student_id = exam_results.student_id WHERE grade >= 90 AND exam_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_name ASC, exam_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM exam_results ORDER BY exam_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, result FROM exam_results WHERE result >= 80;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM exam_results WHERE result > 80;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, exam_date FROM exam_results WHERE exam_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY result DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1999-01-01' AND '2002-01-01';
SELECT student_id, assignment_name, deadline FROM students JOIN assignments ON students.student_id = assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(quiz_id) > 3;
